>
[Unfathomable Stargazer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2391)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cursed" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=274" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 193 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An _unfathomable stargazer_ is a handheld brass telescope etched with constellations, the patterns of which form bizarre, shifting runes. You can observe the night sky with an _unfathomable stargazer_, however, the constellations you glimpse through the telescope distort with expanding and contracting fields of darkness among them. You use [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) instead of Perception or [Astronomy Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) when observing the skies with this item, and gain a +2 item bonus on all checks to do so. Once you use it, it fuses to you, and you must succeed at a DC 35 Will save to use another device to observe the stars, including your naked eyes. The telescope imposes a –4 circumstance penalty to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=64) or navigate. If you critically fail this Survival check, you're subjected to [_warp mind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) (DC 34) as you glimpse something horrifying and alien amid the darkness.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
